Text:

Blu-Ray quality except for the 2 screenshots of the Crazy 88 fight in color, that looks like upscaled DVD to me. Thanks anyway, a lot of people have been waiting for this for a long time.
Awesome post! But been stuck at 5% for quite some time. Please seed.

So I finally finished downloading this. Like I already said mostly blu-ray quality, so it's excellent, with a few new scenes/shots coming from a lower source.
There are only subtitles for non-english dialogues. They're in green and sadly hard-coded so you can't change them.
Thank you for this, it's interesting to see the full version. Maybe one day Tarantino will release this himself.

I'm sure most here have seen these movies in their current release form but for those that haven't I won't spoil it for you. The only thing I would edit out is the reveal before ch. 6. It would actually make the ending a little more interesting. I think that was the way it was in the original screenplay.  Other than that it was a good effort. Thanks.
